constants.name: core_source
constants.header: Translation table for sources of particles, momentum and heat.

int.name: unspecified
int.description: Unspecified source type

int.name: nbi
int.description: Source from Neutral Beam Injection

int.name: ec
int.description: Sources from electron cyclotron heating heating and current drive

int.name: lh
int.description: Sources from lower hybrid heating and current drive

int.name: ic
int.description: Sources from heating at the ion cyclotron range of frequencies

int.name: fusion
int.description: Sources from fusion reactions, e.g. alpha particle heating

int.name: pellet
int.description: Sources from injection

int.name: ic_nbi
int.description: A combination of the ic and nbi sources

int.name: ic_fusion
int.description: A combination of the ic and fusion sources

int.name: ic_nbi_fusion
int.description: A combination of the ic and fusion sources

int.name: ec_lh
int.description: A combination of the ec and lh sources

int.name: ec_ic
int.description: A combination of the ec and ic sources

int.name: lh_ic
int.description: A combination of the lh and ic sources

int.name: ec_lh_ic
int.description: A combination of the ec, lh and ic sources

int.name: ohmic
int.description: Source from ohmic heating

int.name: brehmstrahlung
int.description: Source from bremstrahlung

int.name: cyclotronradiation
int.description: Source from cyclotron radiation

int.name: syncrotronradiation
int.description: Source from syncrotron radiation

int.name: cyclotron_syncrotronradiation
int.description: Source from syncrotron radiation

int.name: lineradiation
int.description: Source from line radiation

int.name: equipartition
int.description: Collisional equipartition

int.name: gaspuff
int.description: Gas puff

int.name: killergaspuff
int.description: Killer gas puff

int.name: ionizationlosses
int.description: Losses due to ionization

int.name: coldneutralcooling
int.description: Cold neutrals from the edge that enters the plasma

int.name: particles2wall
int.description: Particle pumping by the wall

int.name: particles2pump
int.description: Particle pumping by external pumps

int.name: database
int.description: Source from database entry

int.name: background
int.description: Background source

int.name: impurity
int.description: Impurity source

int.name: combined
int.description: Combined source

int.name: not_provided
int.description: No data provided

int.name: runaways
int.description: Source run-away processes; includes both electron and ion run-away

int.name: unspecified_DERIVED
int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. Unspecified source type

int.name: nbi_DERIVED
int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. Source from Neutral Beam Injection

int.name: ec_DERIVED
int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. Sources from electron cyclotron heating heating and current drive

int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. Sources from lower hybrid heating and current drive

int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. A combination of the ic and nbi sources

int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. A combination of the ic and fusion sources

int.description: Derived from another source; duplicating data. A combination of the ic and fusion sources
